thread.title: RFID energizes inventory tracking at Interstate Batteries
thread.title_full: RFID energizes inventory tracking at Interstate Batteries

author: Alan M. Field
title: RFID energizes inventory tracking at Interstate Batteries
text: - A + A RFID energizes inventory tracking at Interstate Batteries In a landmark pilot project that began in 2013, Interstate Batteries demonstrates how the installation of passive RFID systems can help manage consignment or vendor-managed inventories in remote locations.
